result.title: List of operational KPIs, analysis of the users' satisfaction and methodology as a whole, F-REL
result.description: These deliverables D31 and D32 will provide per each relevant demonstration scenario identified in WP2 in 2 different versions CREL in M8 and FREL in M17 a methodological framework as a roadmap in the data collection and data analysis for a consistent monitoring of IP4 solutions in real environments and a market acceptance analysis through the assessment of needs and expectations of current and future users travellers and TSPs when using IP4 solutions In particular they will provide1 A list and a metric of relevant KPIs to be considered in the assessment of each demonstration for a market acceptance 2 A methodology and roadmap to measure the satisfaction index of users travellers and TSPs through surveys after testing the IP4 solutions A sociodemographic analysis to identify critical profiles or traveller groups with special needs and expectations will be also addressed in this deliverable jointly with a statistical approach about the representativeness of samples for the analysis of each critical profile3 A methodology about how to manage all the gathered data regarding KPIs per each demonstration scenario and the satisfaction index per each usecase intersection of a demonstration scenario and a specific profile through the Efficiency rate as a universal metric A statistical approach about the significance of the results will be also included in this deliverable The CREL version D31 ready in M8 will be an initial version to allow an appropriate planning and monitoring of demonstrations WP4 and the coordination and start of demonstrations WP5This deliverable will be updated in a FREL version D32 ready in M17 to feed the performance of demonstrations WP5 and the performance assessment WP6 In this Deliverable D32 the list and metric of KPIs the methodology to measure the satisfaction index through surveys and the methodology as a whole about how to manage all this information together will be updated on the basis of the real capabilities of the demonstration planning WP4 and the demonstration execution WP5

result.title: IMI2-PainCare-BioPain-RCT1: study protocol for a randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, crossover, multi-center trial in healthy subjects to investigate the effects of lacosamide, pregabalin, and tapentadol on biomarkers of pain processing observed by peripheral nerve excitability testing (NET).
